name: Stamina
description:
An endless, brutally difficult minimalist 64x64 pixel action game where you survive hordes of enemies with only a sword and dodges. Your stamina bar is also your health bar.

Use the arrow keys to move, 'Z' to attack and LShift ('X' in browser) to dodge.  Alt+Enter to go fullscreen.

In browser use 'S' to turn off sound and 'D' to turn it back on.
